seoTitle: Forklift Battery Sales & Service | Lithium Batteries | Battery Rejuvenation | Lift Pros
seoDescription: Premier forklift battery sales and service center in Central Valley, CA. Lithium battery conversions, lead acid rejuvenation, and free battery demos. Serving Fresno, Bakersfield, Stockton, and all of California.
heroDescription: Upgrade your fleet to lithium. Extend the life of your lead acid batteries. Central Valley's go-to battery specialists for warehouses, cold storage, and distribution centers.
lithiumSubtitle: The industry is moving to lithium. We make the switch simple, affordable, and fully supported with local service.

lithiumCards.title: Opportunity Charging
lithiumCards.description: No more battery swap rooms. Lithium batteries charge during breaks and shift changes. Plug in for 15 minutes, get hours of runtime.

lithiumCards.title: Freezer Ready
lithiumCards.description: Lithium batteries perform in freezer and cold storage environments where lead acid struggles. Consistent power output down to -22°F.

lithiumCards.title: Lower Total Cost
lithiumCards.description: 3-4x longer lifespan than lead acid. No watering, no equalizing, no dedicated charging rooms. The ROI is clear within the first year.

lithiumCards.title: Drop-In Replacement
lithiumCards.description: Lithium batteries fit your existing equipment. No modifications needed for most forklifts and material handling equipment.

lithiumCards.title: Fleet-Wide Conversion
lithiumCards.description: We plan and execute full fleet conversions. Phased rollouts available to fit your budget and operations schedule.

lithiumCards.title: Service & Support
lithiumCards.description: Not a drop-ship vendor. We install, service, and support every battery we sell. On-site diagnostics and warranty support included.

splitHeading: Why Operations Managers Are Switching to Lithium
splitText: Eliminate battery swap rooms. Cut maintenance costs by 50%. Get consistent power in freezer environments where lead acid fails. Our fleet conversion specialists handle the transition from assessment to installation.
rejuvSubtitle: Not ready for lithium? Extend the life of your lead acid batteries by up to 50% with our rejuvenation service. We'll prove it works for free.

rejuvCards.title: How It Works
rejuvCards.description: Our rejuvenation process breaks down sulfation buildup on lead acid battery plates, restoring capacity lost over time. Most batteries recover 70-90% of original capacity.

rejuvCards.title: Free Sample — No Risk
rejuvCards.description: Send us one battery or we'll come pick it up. We'll rejuvenate it and return it at no charge. See the results yourself before committing to your full fleet.

rejuvCards.title: Fraction of Replacement Cost
rejuvCards.description: A new forklift battery runs $3,000-$8,000+. Rejuvenation costs a fraction of that and gives you years of additional service life.

rejuvCards.title: Reduce Waste
rejuvCards.description: Keep batteries out of the recycling stream longer. Better for your budget and better for the environment. Responsible fleet management.

equipSubtitle: Batteries for every application in your warehouse, yard, or distribution center.

equipCards.title: Cold Storage

equipCards.title: Pallet Jacks

equipCards.title: Scissor Lifts

equipCards.title: Tow Tractors & AGVs
equipCards.description: Batteries for tow tractors, burden carriers, and automated guided vehicles.
